rules.description: Underscore + E to open Microsoft Edge
Underscore + V to open VS Code
Underscore + Shift + V to open Cisco VPN
Underscore + F to open Focus To-Do
Press left command key alone to F14 key
Press left command key alone to F13 key
japanese_kana + U/O Crtl Version : excluded VSCode, iTerm2
japanese_eisuu + rows of Q and A to number and sign keys
Press Left Command or Eisuu and Space, Launch Spotlight wihout IME
